# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please use [GitHub Issues](../../issues) to report any security vulnerabilities, bugs, or concerns related to this repository.

> **Note:** Issues in this repository are public. If your report contains highly sensitive details, please omit them from the issue and indicate that you have additional private information to share.

When reporting a vulnerability, include as much detail as possible:

- A description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Potential impact
- Any suggested fixes (optional)

Issues will be reviewed and addressed as soon as possible.
